overview: A frustrated writer uses the castles and sensual charm of old Germany to inspire his writings. Amidst the forests, barns, villages, and even the notorious clubs of the Red-Light District, the tales and situations presented here make for a sexually charged video of decadent delights! Hop aboard and get the lay of this sensual land.
tagline: He Wrote the Words That Turned Fantasy Into Reality
title: Hot Nights & Dirty Days
